name: The Moon's Cherished Flower
description:
"Your niece is missing, her parents just passed away, and their house was burnt down. Her diaries are your only clue now to find where she is and what actually happened to this family. Good luck!"

Features:
  • ~6,000 words
  • 30 - 45 minutes of gameplay
  • 3 different endings
  • 33 unique diary entries
  • Feels.
Credits:
  • Story / Code / GUI / BG : Sei
  • Story: Nat
  • Art : Liisu
  • Music : Shirima
  • SFX : Freesound
  • GUI Template by BáiYù, bobcgames, minute & npckc
Notes:

This game was created for the Shoot For The Stars Jam, and is currently still under development! We still have a few features and fixes we'd like to implement to make this game even better, so please let us know if you encounter any bugs or errors!

Thank you for playing!

Follow us on Twitter for more updates!
